title: Daddy's Girl
description: Every brat needs a Daddy.Daddy's tastes are naughty and rough,finding the right girl has been tough.Daddy's had them all you see,but his little girl is the one he can't set free.Now Daddy has a lovely pet,a naughty toy that's scared of every threat.But brats are always hard to train,and Daddy's girl has earned the cane.Time to break out the whips and chains,get some blood pulsing through baby's veins.Think twice before you disobey,pretty girls in tears make Daddy's day...
author: Isabella Starling
